images.name: 1_N
images.desc: This was probably the toughest semester of all. And I guess in this case, I am speaking for all (except Nisarg and Chahak). It was the most difficult semester when Signals & System and EMT attacks you in each and every possible way. Some of us got a F in it and some just survived with 4. More dramatic part were the results which were delivered on the way to our Rural Internship.

images.name: 2_N
images.desc: This was the semester when all of us stayed awake till 3-4 as even going to lectures didn’t do us good (we believed so, but apparently it wasn’t true).

images.name: 3_H
images.desc: Laptop Wallpapers: Shrey Edition. We don’t know why but Shrey had a weird taste of Desktop Wallpapers. Have a look. (Narrator: It wasn’t Shrey who made these choices)

images.name: 4_V
images.desc: People have their own styles to bring out their creative energy and problem-solving skills to the fullest. Here is Master Shrey practicing his Frog style while reading for Insem exams.

images.name: 5_V
images.desc: Being a Doctor Strange fan, Rutul occasionally uses a hand towel as his cloak. He is probably trying to lift a pen with his telekinetic powers.

images.name: 10_N
images.desc: This semester we also helped clean up Shrey’s internet profile which was miserable and embarrassing. We started with giving him shocks by commenting on his old pictures to make him realize what a dumpster fire his Facebook was. It was a frenzy with other batchmates pouring in too. He had to later delete them out of embarrassment.  We still have them saved though in form of screenshots.

images.name: 11_H
images.desc: Playing with Shrey’s Facebook account. P.S: Roshan ne hi kiya tha.

images.name: 12_H
images.desc: Still early years when Rutul was struggling with his life being a company and working at employee. He then went on to become an employee at a company. What a complete turnaround.

images.name: 13_H
images.desc: This is how we compressed ourselves. Shrey’s bed, but no place for him to sleep. Devansh is so elastic that he can sleep in any form of any alphabet or digit. He is just the human liquid who can fill the given space.

images.name: 14_V
images.desc: Can't figure out if it is Blastoise or Shrey.

images.name: 15_V
images.desc: This semester had an Android workshop. They distributed stickers in the last lecture. Guess who didn’t complete the lectures but stole the stickers? :p

images.name: 16_H
images.desc: Roshan can’t become a mother, but he can be THE MUMMY. Can we drape him with more blankets please?

images.name: 17_H
images.desc: ifest: Awesome background art and awesomer frontend person.

images.name: 18_N
images.desc: On 8th Nov 2016, Demonetization struck. Roshan was getting some medicines when the news was playing on the Medical Store television. They straightaway rejected his 500 Rs currency note, even though the deadline was midnight ☹. In the aftermath too, many of us ran to banks and post-offices to get our old notes exchanged for legal tenders. Too much chaos running everywhere, but equally fun.

images.name: 19_H
images.desc: Rutul trying to promote Nike. So some backstory time here. Nike officials came to Rutul for their tagline, he suggested them 2-3. But they weren’t satisfied. So when the officials asked again, Rutul in a frustrated tone yelled “Just Do It, yaar”. They dropped the yaar to target global markets.

images.name: 20_H
images.desc: During third sem, Rutul had a phone which was always low on memory and thus couldn’t install many apps. So whenever he felt like playing games, he used other phones. Here is Rutul and Roshan getting in a Chappal-fight as Rutul played 3-4 continuous games in Roshan’s phone and lost them all (wtf rutul), and hence decreasing Roshan’s rank in that game.
